title: Dark star icons
body: whos gotten the icon u need to play with friends coz im still waiting on mine ~_~

replies.body: I have no friends. I really wish Riot would stop releasing icons you need friends to achieve.
Like you just need a premade, even if you play one and ask others if they wanna premade too you get it, I got mine with a friend and his friend, took like 4 days to get the icon though
I already got mine. So can confirm you defs get the icon if you party with friends. I'd be happy to play the game mode just make sure you know how to thresh haha to make it easier for the both of us.

um well i played with people already haha, we went on a winning streak, ye i had to keep inviting ppl on my so called "friends" list and ye i also ended up getting 3 hexteck key frags in a row too xD coz like ur a full team but i dont see that luck ever xD ~_~
